hero.title: Premium Song Names
text: Start generating song names from the largest database of available song names that has been ever created.
Generate over 2,842,000 unique song names to delight your future fans and catch the attention of producers all around the world.

description_section.title: Become musically famous
description_section.text: Become the next family to disrupt the music industry by generating entire albums together. You can even save the best ones for later and continue generating until you find just the right one.

premium_section.title: Handcrafted Song Names
premium_section.text: Are you in need of handcrafter premium song names? Say no more pal! With Song Generator Plus for only 4.99$ you will get 6 handcrafted song names directly to your mailbox.

network_section.title: Join The Network
network_section.text: Join the worldâ€™s largest network of new artists, all of which enjoy their newly obtained song name as well as coaching from our experienced team.

apple.label: Download Song Name Generator on Apple's App Store

android.label: Download Song Name Generator on Google's Google Play

faq.question: Is this application free?
faq.answer: It is free! Although we have a premium subscription which gives you access to a network of other users who take song name generation as seriously as you do. Also it helps support the development of the app.

faq.question: How many different song names can be generated from an individual input?
faq.answer: As of now we can generate an average 2,577,312 unique song names for each input, however this number will continue increasing as we gather more data to train our advanced generator.

faq.question: Does the application works offline?
faq.answer: It does! All the computation happens on your device, so you can generate song names without an Internet connection!

faq.question: Will this be available on Windows Phone?
faq.answer: According to our engineering team they expect to have the Windows Phone version ready for Q3 2029, subscribe to our newsletter to keep up to date with further information!
